introductions.intro_greeting.mp3: G’day! You’ve reached Pete's Plumbing. How can we help you today?

pricing.pricing.mp3: Our pricing usually starts at $98 for standard service calls. We’ll provide a full quote after understanding the job better.
pricing.cost_estimate_enquiry.mp3: I can give you a ballpark now, and we’ll confirm once we see the job.

miscellaneous.after_hours_greeting.mp3: G’day, Pete’s Plumbing here. It’s after hours right now, but if it’s urgent, we can still help for an after-hours call-out fee. Otherwise, leave your name and number and we’ll get back to you first thing.
miscellaneous.in_business_how_long.mp3: We’ve been doing this for 7 years now and got loads of happy clients and repeat work. You’ll be in safe hands.
miscellaneous.services_offered.mp3: We handle blocked drains, leaking taps, toilet repairs, hot water issues, and a range of other plumbing issues. We also do gas fitting, pipe relining, and kitchen or bathroom plumbing. What’s the issue you’re facing right now?
miscellaneous.available_hours.mp3: We’re available Monday through Saturday, 8am to 6pm. After-hours emergency support is also available for an extra service fee, so yeah, give us a ring anytime.
miscellaneous.ask_time_day.mp3: We’ve got a few open slots this week. What time and day works for you?
miscellaneous.blocked_drain.mp3: Blocked drain? Yeah, that’s a common one here — we can sort that out quick smart.
miscellaneous.leaking_tap.mp3: Ah, the good ol’ drip. Yep, we can fix that up for ya quick as — shouldn’t take long at all.
miscellaneous.toilet_repair.mp3: Gotcha, we’ll get that toilet working again for you.
miscellaneous.hot_water_issues.mp3: Oof, no hot water’s no fun. We’ll check it out and get you back up and running.
miscellaneous.gas_fitting.mp3: Sure thing, we’re licensed for gas work. Is it for a new install or a check-up?
miscellaneous.pipe_relining.mp3: Yeah, we do pipe relining all the time. Saves you ripping the whole thing out.
miscellaneous.bath_kitchen_plumbing.mp3: Easy done — we can handle the whole lot start to finish. Are you mid-reno now?
miscellaneous.when_can_come.mp3: What's a good time to swing by?
miscellaneous.general_problems.mp3: Righto, I am sure we can help. Can you tell me a bit more about what’s going on there?
miscellaneous.urgent_callout.mp3: If it’s urgent, we can reshuffle and get someone out today. Want me to do that?
miscellaneous.confirmed_bye.mp3: Perfect, you’re locked in. We’ll see you then. Thanks for calling!
miscellaneous.need_to_check.mp3: No worries, I can hold your spot for the day you prefer while you check.
